content: What classic board game involves players trying to capture their opponent's pieces by jumping over them diagonally on an 8x8 grid?

The classic board game you're referring to is likely "Checkers," also known as "Draughts." It's played on an 8x8 checkerboard, with players attempting to capture their opponent's pieces by jumping over them diagonally. The goal is to eliminate all of the opponent's pieces or block them so they cannot make any moves. Checkers has a rich history and is enjoyed by people around the world.
